I believe this could happen if the AntView had AntModels that had no project 
node (and empty or quite invalid buildfile).

All the fModel.getProjectNode() usage should be checked.

Fixed up AntProjectNodeProxy.
Cleaned up continuous parsing when in error state and the settting of the 
error state when the buildfile is massively bad.
As well fixed the resolution of the buildfile resource when in an error state 
(double click on such a node produced an NPE as well).

Easiest test I found was to create an empty buildfile.
Add it to the Ant view.
Attempt to add other buildfiles to the Ant view.
